definition: work chant/prison cell/type/sort/mark/sign/signal/(Tw) brokerage firm
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people
roar/cry/CL:個|个[ge4]
(noun suffix)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: The work's chant maybe a rapid one.
sentences.chinese: 這也許是比較急促的號子。

sentences.english: Wyatt shows up at the police station and seesMahone in the cell.
sentences.chinese: 懷亞特在警察局出現，發現了馬宏被關在號子裏。

sentences.english: The blues grew out of African spirituals and work songs.
sentences.chinese: 布魯斯樂成長自非洲人的精神和勞動號子中。

sentences.english: The blues comes from African songs that people used to sing when they worked and during festivals.
sentences.chinese: 布魯斯來源於非洲的勞動號子和節慶歌唱。

sentences.english: Mentions the boatman worker's chant, our young friend possibly not too understood.
sentences.chinese: 說起船工號子，我們年輕的朋友可能不太瞭解。

sentences.english: Southern Gansu, and eastern Gansu labor chant and songs Jia Miao, unique style.
sentences.chinese: 甘肅隴南和隴東的勞動號子，詞曲佳妙，風格獨特。

sentences.english: A brokerage yuppie no longer, Wu Hsin-hui now works happily in insurance.
sentences.chinese: 不做號子英雄，吳心慧是個快樂的保險業務員。

sentences.english: Sure, some old buddies of mine did time there once.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我的一些老朋友在那地方蹲過號子。
